{
  "explanation": "The description 'Used to honor device-level opt-out preferences' closely relates to respecting user choices regarding data collection and personalization at the device level. The most relevant terms are related to personalization, advertising, and data preferences where users have control. 'Service Personalisation', 'Personalised Advertising', and 'Targeted Advertising' directly relate to personalized content and services, respecting opt-out preferences. 'Provide Personalised Recommendations' and 'Provide Product Recommendations' similarly involve user choices for personalized experiences. 'Privacy safeguards' would be ensured by purposes like 'Fulfilment of Obligation' and 'Legal Compliance' when honoring opt-outs is legally mandated.",
